text: Roland Widmer (born 26 September 1965) is a retired Swiss football defender.Weltfussball ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:Swiss footballers Category:FC Luzern players Category:Neuchâtel Xamax FCS players Category:FC Wettingen players Category:FC Zürich players Category:Association football defenders Category:Swiss Super League players Category:Switzerland under-21 international footballers
